long_description: Sram PC 870 8-speed powerlink chain is a smooth operator wherever the trail or path takes you-nickle-plated finish looks beautiful! Convenient PowerLink(TM) makes it easy to join links together without tools. Chrome-hardened push pin adds strength and reduces the likelihood of breakdown.
short_description: Sram PC 870 8-speed powerlink chain is a smooth operator wherever the trail or path takes you-nickle-plated finish looks beautiful!
